body:
To start off, these series of topics will revolve around what 10 items you would take with you for certain scenarios. There will be one every 3 days, if we get enough posts for this one.
Choose your items wisely and, elaborate why you chose those 10 items.

Rules:
  • You can have goofy stuff but, nothing inappropriate 
  • No swearing
  • Keep it on topic
Lets start off with something easy. 

What 10 items would you take with you on a deserted island?



Example:
Item - Reason
1. Water purifier - Purify water
2. Radio - Signal support
3. Firewood - Keep a fire going
4. Plant seeds - To grow food
5. Pillow - Sleep on
6. Knife - Skin fish
7. Gummy snakes - To eat when there's no food
8. Flint and steel - to make the fire
9. Hatchet - Cut limbs off the trees
10. Fish catching net - To grab more fish

You try!

1.) An oil tanker- to get out the island
2.)A big oil drum- to fuel the ship and airplane
3.)An f-18 hornet- to fly home
4.)A ship mounted-catapult- to launch the f-18
5.)Food supplies for a month- to eat
6.)Drank supplies for a month- to eat
7.)An AK-47 or M1 carbine - to shoot stuff
8.)ammunition- to feed the guns
9.)Gatorade bottles for a year's supply- for the electrolytes
10.)  Corn nuts- they taste good

replies.body:
Soz if i copy some of them you had good choices :P
1) Water Purifier - good for being stranded on a island
2) Tent - Need this for the first couple days until i build my wooden mansion xD
3) Spear - Good for hunting fish/animal and i can use it to cut them open
4) A Survival Book for dummies - self explanatory xD
5) Couple Months supply of fruits and veggies - for food and replanting on the island
6) A Person - for personal reasons :P and so i don't go insane
7) A blueprint for a Decent Size Boat - so i can sail away with enough food until i find other people
8) Those Flash things you shoot in the sky to call help
9) Barbecue - to cook the food
10) Scuba Diving Gear - idk it be fun to scuba dive while stranded
